div.span: Board of Education Combined Work Business Session - April 20, 2020

br.span: This meeting will be conducted virtually. Click on the following links to The Marshall Board of Education will meet on Monday, April 20, 2020 for a Combined Work / Business Session at 7:00 p.m. View Agenda; View the Meeting Remotely on the Board’s You Tube Channel; and/or Complete a Public Comment Request Form by 7:00 PM if you plan to make any comments.

div.span: New Security Polices and Physical Upgrades at Every School Building

br.span: Marshall Public Schools has added new security policies and physical upgrades at every school building in our district. View a letter describing the upgrades and what to expect when arriving at a school building. View Letter

div.span: School of Choice First Semester Enrollment for 2020-2021

span.span: Applications for all grade levels are now being accepted for the first semester of the 2020
-2021 school year. Classes start August 26, 2020. Submit applications to the Superintendent’s Office at 100 East Green Street; Marshall, MI 49068.
